question: Jayantavarman was succeeded by which of the following kings?
explanation: Arikesary Maravarman was the son and successor of king Jayantavarman. During his reign, the Pandya power expanded at the cost of the Cheras. There also started the struggle between the Pandyas and the Pallavas. Arikesari was a great soldier and he won a spectacular victory at Nelveli.
